Trade/Device Name(s): Quidel Molecular Influenza A + B Assay
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Quidel Molecular Influenza A + B multiplex real-time RT-PCR assay for detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viral RNA from nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viral RNA in nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs from patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection; intended as an aid in differential diagnosis of influenza A and B infections in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors
